reuze

Class ib_FilterMarble

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.ib_a_Ops
      • reuze.ib_a_FilterTransform
        • reuze.ib_FilterMarble
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.BufferedImageOp

    public class ib_FilterMarble
extends ib_a_FilterTransform
    This filter applies a marbling effect to an image, displacing pixels by random amounts.
